devdoc.details: crvUSD price provider that resolves a price via crvUSD/USDC pool IT IS NOT PART OF THE PROTOCOL. SILO CREATED THIS TOOL, MOSTLY AS AN EXAMPLE.

params._asset: address of an asset for which to read price

returns.price: of asses with 18 decimals, throws when pool is not ready yet to provide price

priceProviderPing().details: this can save us from simple human errors, in case we use invalid address but this should NOT be treated as security check

assetSupported(address).notice: Only ASSET token is supported, false otherwise.

getPrice(address).notice: Returns "Time-Weighted Average Price" for an asset. Calculates TWAP price for quote/asset. It unifies all tokens decimal to 18, examples: - if asses == quote it returns 1e18 - if asset is USDC and quote is ETH and ETH costs ~$3300 then it returns ~0.0003e18 WETH per 1 USDC

priceProviderPing().notice: Helper method that allows easily detects, if contract is PriceProvider

quoteToken().notice: Token address which prices are quoted in. Must be the same as PriceProvidersRepository.quoteToken
